description: \c[14]<不朽>\c[0] 被逼至绝境不得不使用禁忌秘术的魔法师。即使即将坠入深渊也要消灭敌人。
name: 最后一搏！
note:
\fb发动1:\fb移除此卡.将当前生命降低至1. 每以此法损失4点生命,从牌堆中抽取 1张牌
\fb发动2:\fb从对方手卡选择1张卡移除 // Target card player is the user player. $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; // Exhausts this card as a cost. $targetCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); // Calculate the number of cards to draw. $calc.drawCard = Math.round(0.25 * ($userCardPlayer.currentHealth - 1)); // Deduct health from target player. $targetCardPlayer.currentHealth = 1; // Play an animation on the target player. var animationId = 54; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); enable = false; var cards = $userCardPlayer.hand.length; var library = $userCardPlayer.library.length; var health = $userCardPlayer.currentHealth; var chouqushu = Math.round(0.25 * ($userCardPlayer.currentHealth - 1)); enable = cards <= 100 && chouqushu <= library && health > 2 // Exhausts this card as a cost. $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); // Make an empty list to search through. $calc.list = []; // Reveal every card in player's hand for (var i = 0; i < $targetCardPlayer.hand.length; i++) { var card = $targetCardPlayer.hand[i]; $calc.list.push(card); } // Sort all cards. $scene().sortCardGameCardSprites(); enable = $targetCardPlayer.hand.length > 0; $calc.damage = $userCard.power();

description: \c[14]<不朽>\c[0]一本正经的魔导师蒂菈，无论何时总是保持全神贯注
name: 闲暇之余的魔导师
note:
\fb战后:\fb将这张卡返回至手牌，并使其 攻击力降低1
\fb被动:\fb若这张卡的攻击力降低至1及 以下，将其移除 var gongji = $userCard.power(); if (gongji <= 1) { $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); } $calc.damage = $userCard.power(); // If lose if ($userCard.getOriginalOwner().battleResults.lose) { $userCardPlayer.addCardToHand($userCard); $userCard.gainPower(-1); $userCard.refresh(); // Else } else { $userCardPlayer.addCardToHand($userCard); $userCard.gainPower(-1); $userCard.refresh(); }

description: \c[14]<不朽>\c[0]太过于热情有的时候也是会带来不少麻烦的哦~
name: 热情过火
note:
\fb入场:\fb若对方的攻击力高于你，对其 造成相当于对方基础攻击力的伤害
\fb发动:\fb弃置此卡，选择1张被移除的 卡放于牌堆顶 if ($targetCard.power()> $userCard.power()){ $calc.damage = $targetCard.power(); }else{ $calc.damage = 0; } // Target card player is the user player. $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; // Exhausts this card as a cost. $targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($userCard); // Create an empty $calc.list $calc.list = []; // Get ready to search through target's library var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.exhaust; // Add all cards matching the criteria for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) { var card = searchList[i]; $calc.list.push(card); } $calc.shuffleHand = false; $calc.shuffleLibrary = false; enable = false; var list = $userCardPlayer.exhaust var yichu = list.length; enable = yichu >= 1 $calc.damage = $userCard.power();

description: \c[14]<不朽>\c[0]总是摆出优雅姿态的贵族，内心深处看不起任何低身份的人
name: 秉持风雅
note:
\fb战胜:\fb造成伤害时无视对方护盾
\fb发动:\fb仅限1次，使此卡的攻击力上 升等同于当前自身护甲的数值(唯一) // Target card player is the user player. $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; $gameVariables.setValue(2, 1); $userCard.gainPower($targetCardPlayer.shield); $userCard.refresh(); enable = false; var panduan = $gameVariables.value(2); enable = panduan != 1 $gameVariables.setValue(2, 0); $userCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($userCard); $targetCardPlayer.health -= $userCard.power();

name: 能工巧匠
note:
<Card Art: pictures, Card_Frist>

<Card Rarity: 4>

<Card Element: Earth>
<Card Level: 8>
<Card Power: 2>



<Card Text>
<WordWrap>\fb入场:\fb若你没有护盾，获得等同于当 前生命值的护盾
</Card Text>

<Menu Category: 全部卡牌>
<Menu Category: 土属性>

<Card Pre-Battle JS>
// If user player has 20 health or more
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
if ($targetCardPlayer.shield < 1) {
    // Gain Shields
    $targetCardPlayer.shield += $targetCardPlayer.health;

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 53;

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's exhaust
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.exhaust;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.name().match(/Rogue/i)) {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set Damage
$calc.damage = 5;

// If user player has 20 health or more
if ($userCardPlayer.health >= 20) {
    // Gain Shields
    $userCardPlayer.shield += 3;
    $userCardPlayer.shield = $userCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99);

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 53;
    var mirror = false;
    var delay = 0;
    $userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

note:
\fb发动:\fb1回合1次，选择牌堆中1张风属 性卡弃置
\fb入场:\fb此卡的等级与攻击力此次战斗 中上升等于弃置区风属性卡数量的值 var shuliang = 0 for (var i = 0; i < $userCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) { var card = $userCardPlayer.discard[i]; // Check card element if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'WIND') { // Increase damage shuliang += 1; } } $userCard.gainLevel(shuliang); $userCard.gainPower(shuliang); $userCard.refresh(); $userCard.turnFlags.used = true; $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; $calc.list = []; var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library; for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) { var card = searchList[i]; if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'WIND') { $calc.list.push(card); } } $calc.shuffleHand = false; $calc.shuffleLibrary = false; enable = false; var cards = $userCardPlayer.hand.length; enable = !$userCard.turnFlags.used && cards > 1 $calc.damage = $userCard.power(); var zengjia = 4 - $userCard.power(); $userCard.gainLevel(zengjia); $userCard.gainPower(zengjia); $userCard.refresh(); $userCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($userCard);

description: \c[30]<神话>\c[0] 身材庞大，移动迟缓，力大无穷。可千万不能小看了它！
name: 贝希摩斯
note:
\fb入场:\fb使对手的等级与攻击力下降至0
\fb战后:\fb回复6点生命 var shuliang = 0 - $targetCard.level(); var shuliang2 = 0 - $targetCard.power(); $targetCard.gainLevel(shuliang); $targetCard.gainPower(shuliang2); $targetCard.refresh(); $calc.damage = $userCard.power(); $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; $calc.heal = 6; $targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($userCard);

name: 傲啸
note:
\fb发动:\fb1回合1次，失去4点生命，对手 随机弃置1张手卡
\fb入场:\fb选择对手1张手卡弃置 $calc.list = []; for (var i = 0; i < $targetCardPlayer.hand.length; i++) { var card = $targetCardPlayer.hand[i]; $calc.list.push(card); } $scene().sortCardGameCardSprites(); $userCard.turnFlags.used = true; $calc.discard = 1; $userCardPlayer.health -= 4; enable = !$userCard.turnFlags.used && $targetCardPlayer.hand.length > 0 && $userCardPlayer.currentHealth > 4 $calc.damage = $userCard.power();

<Card Spell 1 JS>
$userCard.turnFlags.used = true;
var card = $userCardPlayer.library.pop();
if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'FIRE') {
	$userCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard(card);
	$calc.damage = 8;
}else{
$userCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard(card);
$userCardPlayer.addCardToLibrary($userCard);
$userCardPlayer.shuffleCards($userCardPlayer.library);
$calc.damage = 0;
}
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Check if library is greater than 0
if ($userCardPlayer.library.length > 0) {
    // Mill the top card
    var topCard = $userCardPlayer.library.pop();
    $userCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard(topCard);

    // Set damage to card's level
    $calc.damage = topCard.level();

    // Wait
    $wait(20);

// Else
} else {
    // Set it to zero damage otherwise.
    $calc.damage = 0;
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

$calc.damage = 0;

}

name: Big Boss
note:
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage.
\fbUpkeep:\fb Reveal this card in your hand and top card of your Library; that card's element becomes \i[247]Null. // Reveal card $userCard._isRevealed = true; $userCard.sprite().flip(10, false); // Reveal top card of library var topCard = $userCardPlayer.library[$userCardPlayer.library.length - 1]; topCard._isRevealed = true; topCard.sprite().flip(10, false); // Set Element topCard.setElement('None'); topCard.setTemplate('None'); topCard.sprite().setupCardFront(); topCard.refresh();

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set damage
$calc.damage = Math.max(0, $userCard.power() - $targetCard.power());
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Restores card's original stats
$targetCard.gainPower(1);
</Card Post-Battle JS>

description:
<WordWrap>\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage. 
\fbSpell:\fb Once per turn, pay 1 \i[127]Level: Pick a card in either player's Discard; shuffle that card into its owner's Library.
name: Timeless Dark Lord
note:
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage.
\fbSpell:\fb Once per turn, pay 1 \i[127]Level: Pick a card in either player's Discard; shuffle that card into its owner's Library. // Once per turn $userCard.turnFlags.used = true; // Pay 2 Levels $userCard.gainLevel(-2); $userCard.refresh(); // Target card player is the user player. $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; // Make an empty list to search through. $calc.list = []; // Reveal every card in player's discard for (var i = 0; i < $targetCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) { var card = $targetCardPlayer.discard[i]; $calc.list.push(card); } // Sort all cards. $scene().sortCardGameCardSprites(); enable = !$userCard.turnFlags.used && $userCard.level() >= 2 && $userCardPlayer.discard.length > 0 // Once per turn $userCard.turnFlags.used = true; // Pay 2 Levels $userCard.gainLevel(-2); $userCard.refresh(); // Make an empty list to search through. $calc.list = []; // Reveal every card in player's discard for (var i = 0; i < $targetCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) { var card = $targetCardPlayer.discard[i]; $calc.list.push(card); } // Sort all cards. $scene().sortCardGameCardSprites(); enable = !$userCard.turnFlags.used && $userCard.level() >= 2 && $targetCardPlayer.discard.length > 0

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'FIRE') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Post-Battle JS>

description:

\fbSpell:\fb Self-Exhaust. Deal \i[78]Direct Damage equal to the \i[127]Level of your Discard's top card.
name: Fire Wizard
note:
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage.
\fbSpell:\fb Self-Exhaust. Deal \i[78]Direct Damage equal to the \i[127]Level of your Discard's top card. // Get top card of discard pile var topCard = $userCardPlayer.discard[$userCardPlayer.discard.length - 1]; // Set damage to be dealt $calc.damage = topCard.level(); // Exhausts this card as a cost. $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); enable = $userCardPlayer.discard.length > 0;

description:
<WordWrap>\fbEngage:\fb Increase this card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power by +2 for each Army Soldier in your Discard during battle. 
\fbVictory:\fb Deal \i[76]Damage equal to this card's \i[97]Power.
name: Army Soldier
note:
\fbEngage:\fb Increase this card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power by +2 for each Army Soldier in your Discard during battle.
\fbVictory:\fb Deal \i[76]Damage equal to this card's \i[97]Power. // For Loop for (var i = 0; i < $userCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) { var card = $userCardPlayer.discard[i]; // Check card name if (card.name().match(/Army Soldier/i)) { // Increase Level and Power $userCard.gainLevel(2); $userCard.gainPower(2); } } // Set target card $targetCard = $userCard; // Set animation $calc.animationId = 51; // Set damage $calc.damage = $userCard.power(); // Restores card's original stats $userCard.restoreOriginalStats();

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'FIRE') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

    var card = $userCardPlayer.discard[i];

    // Check card element
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'FIRE') {

        // Increase damage
        $calc.damage += 1;
    }
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Card Spell 1 JS>
// Exhausts this card as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard);

// Pay two health as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.currentHealth -= 2;

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Draw 2 cards
var cards = 2;
var wait = true;
$targetCardPlayer.drawCard(cards, wait);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = $userCardPlayer.library.length >= 2
    && $userCardPlayer.currentHealth > 2;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Parallax FG Blend Mode: Screen>

</Card Holo FG Speed: 1>

</Card Holo FG Blend Mode: Normal>

<Menu Category: Cards>
<Menu Category: Fire>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set Damage
$calc.damage = 5;

// If user player has 20 health or more
if ($userCardPlayer.health >= 20) {
    // Make clone of enemy player's hand
    var hand = $targetCardPlayer.hand.clone();

    // For Loop
    for (var i = 0; i < hand.length; i++) {
        var card = hand[i];

        // Reveal Card
        card._isRevealed = true;
        card.sprite().flip(10, false);
    }
    $scene().sortCardGameCardSprites();

    // Wait
    $wait(20);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

description:

\fbSpell:\fb Self-Discard. Break \i[128]Shields equal to the \i[97]Power of the top card in your opponent's Discard.
name: Gustaf
note:
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage.
\fbSpell:\fb Self-Discard. Break \i[128]Shields equal to the \i[97]Power of the top card in your opponent's Discard. // Get top card of discard pile var topCard = $targetCardPlayer.discard[$targetCardPlayer.discard.length - 1]; // Set shield damage to be dealt $calc.shieldDamage = topCard.power(); // Exhausts this card as a cost. $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); // Play Animation var animationId = 56; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); enable = $targetCardPlayer.discard.length > 0 && $targetCardPlayer.shield > 0;

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'WATER') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Post-Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'WATER') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle Common Event: 987>

<Card Spell 1 JS>
// Set shield damage to be dealt
$calc.shieldDamage = 8;

// Discards this card as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($userCard);

// Breaks own Shield
$userCardPlayer.shield -= 8;
$userCardPlayer.shield = $userCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99);

// Play Animation
var animationId = 56;
var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
$targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = $targetCardPlayer.shield > 0
    || $userCardPlayer.shield > 0;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

var animationId = 56;
var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

enable = $targetCardPlayer.shield > 0;

// Set Damage
$calc.damage = 5;

// If user player has 20 health or more

    // Discard random card from player's hand
    var card = $targetCardPlayer.hand[Math.floor(Math.random() * $targetCardPlayer.hand.length)];

    // Wait
    $wait(20);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set base damage
$calc.damage = 0;

// For Loop
for (var i = 0; i < $userCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) {
    var card = $userCardPlayer.discard[i];

    // Check card element
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'WATER') {

        // Increase damage
        $calc.damage += 1;
    }
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

$calc.discard = 1;

    && $userCard.level() >= 2

<Menu Category: Cards>
<Menu Category: Earth>

\fbDefeat:\fb Search your Library for a \i[69]Wind card. Place that card on top of your Library.

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'EARTH') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Post-Battle JS>

<Card Post-Battle Common Event: 984>

description:
<WordWrap>\fbEngage:\fb Increase this card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power by +1 for each \i[68]Earth card in your Discard during battle. 
\fbVictory:\fb Deal \i[76]Damage equal to this card's \i[97]Power.
name: Ratty McRatface
note:
\fbEngage:\fb Increase this card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power by +1 for each \i[68]Earth card in your Discard during battle.
\fbVictory:\fb Deal \i[76]Damage equal to this card's \i[97]Power. // For Loop for (var i = 0; i < $userCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) { var card = $userCardPlayer.discard[i]; // Check card element if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'EARTH') { // Increase Level and Power $userCard.gainLevel(1); $userCard.gainPower(1); } } // Set target card $targetCard = $userCard; // Set animation $calc.animationId = 51; // Set damage $calc.damage = $userCard.power(); // Restores card's original stats $userCard.restoreOriginalStats();

<Card Spell 1 JS>
// Get top card of discard pile
var topCard = $userCardPlayer.discard[$userCardPlayer.discard.length - 1];

// Set shields to gain
$calc.shield = topCard.level();

// Exhausts this card as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard);

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = $userCardPlayer.discard.length > 0;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Spell 1 Common Event: 994>

<Card Spell 1 Icon: 68>
<Card Spell 1 Name: Gain \i[128]Shields>
<Card Spell 1 Animation: 51>

<Card Spell 1 Allow AI Use>

description:
<WordWrap>\fbEngage:\fb This card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power matches the top card of your Discard during battle. 
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage.
name: Puppet Mimic
note:
\fbEngage:\fb This card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power matches the top card of your Discard during battle.
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage. // Check if the user player's discard pile has a card if ($userCardPlayer.discard.length > 0) { // Set target card to user card. $targetCard = $userCard; // Get top discard pile card var topCard = $userCardPlayer.discard[$userCardPlayer.discard.length - 1]; // Change target card's level/power to top card's level/power $targetCard.setLevel(topCard.level()); $targetCard.setPower(topCard.power()); // Play animation 51 var animationId = 51; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $targetCard.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); $targetCard.refresh(); // Wait 40 frames $wait(40); }; // Revert card's original stats. $userCard.restoreOriginalStats(); $userCard.refresh();

description:
<WordWrap>\fbEngage:\fb This card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power matches the top card of opponent's Discard during battle. 
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage.
name: Chest Mimic
note:
\fbEngage:\fb This card's \i[127]Level and \i[97]Power matches the top card of opponent's Discard during battle.
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage. // Check if the opposing player's discard pile has a card if ($targetCardPlayer.discard.length > 0) { // Set target card to user card. $targetCard = $userCard; // Get top discard pile card var topCard = $targetCardPlayer.discard[$targetCardPlayer.discard.length - 1]; // Change target card's level/power to top card's level/power $targetCard.setLevel(topCard.level()); $targetCard.setPower(topCard.power()); // Play animation 51 var animationId = 51; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $targetCard.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); $targetCard.refresh(); // Wait 40 frames $wait(40); }; // Revert card's original stats. $userCard.restoreOriginalStats(); $userCard.refresh();

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'EARTH') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Pre-Battle JS>
// Change target card's level/power to swap stats
var originalLevel = $targetCard.level();
var originalPower = $targetCard.power();
$targetCard.setLevel(originalPower);
$targetCard.setPower(originalLevel);

// Play animation
var animationId = 54;
var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$targetCard.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
$targetCard.refresh();

// Wait 40 frames
$wait(40);
</Card Pre-Battle JS>

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Revert card's original stats.
$targetCard.restoreOriginalStats();
$targetCard.refresh();
</Card Post-Battle JS>

if ($targetCardPlayer.shield > 0) {

// Set base damage
$calc.damage = 0;

// For Loop
for (var i = 0; i < $userCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) {
    var card = $userCardPlayer.discard[i];

    // Check card element
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'EARTH') {

        // Increase damage
        $calc.damage += 1;
    }
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

// Reveal card
$userCard._isRevealed = true;

    // Pay 1 Health
    $userCardPlayer.health -= 1;

    // Gain Shield
    $calc.shield = 2;
}

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set Damage
$calc.damage = 5;

// If user player has 20 health or more
if ($userCardPlayer.health >= 20) {
    // Mill 3
    $targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($targetCardPlayer.library.pop());
    setTimeout($targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard.bind($targetCardPlayer, $targetCardPlayer.library.pop()), 1000/60 * 20);
    setTimeout($targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard.bind($targetCardPlayer, $targetCardPlayer.library.pop()), 1000/60 * 40);
    $wait(60);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

// Set Damage
$calc.damage = 5;

// If user player has 10 health or less
if ($userCardPlayer.health <= 10) {
    // Gain Shields
    $userCardPlayer.shield += 5;
    $userCardPlayer.shield = $userCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99);

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 53;
    var mirror = false;
    var delay = 0;
    $userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Card Pre-Battle JS>
// Get Turn Count
var varId = Imported.Irina_CardGameMechanics.TurnTrackerVariable;
var turnCount = $gameVariables.value(varId);

// Check Turn Requirement
if (turnCount < 10) {
    // Increase Level
    $userCard.gainPower($userCard.power());

    // Set Animation
    $calc.animationId = 51;

    // Set target card
    $targetCard = $userCard;
}
</Card Pre-Battle JS>

<Card Pre-Battle Common Event: 981>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set damage
$calc.damage = $userCard.power();
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Card Win Battle Common Event: 991>

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Restores card's original stats
$userCard.restoreOriginalStats();
</Card Post-Battle JS>

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'WIND') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Post-Battle JS>

<Card Post-Battle Common Event: 984>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'WIND') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle Common Event: 987>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.name().match(/=BOT=/i)) {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle Common Event: 984>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Create clone of opponent's hand
var hand = $targetCardPlayer.hand.clone();

// For loop
for (var i = 0; i < hand.length; i++) {
    var card = hand[i];
    card._isRevealed = true;
    card.sprite().flip(10, false);

    if (card.element().toUpperCase() !== 'EARTH') {
        $targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard(card);
    }
}
$wait(10);
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's discard
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.discard;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.name().match(/Rogue/i)) {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Hand Upkeep JS>
// Reveal card
$userCard._isRevealed = true;
$userCard.sprite().flip(10, false);

// Make sure have Health
if ($userCardPlayer.health > 1) {
    // Pay 1 Health
    $userCardPlayer.health -= 1;

    // Draw card
    $calc.drawCard = 1;
}

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
</Card Hand Upkeep JS>

    var topCard = $targetCardPlayer.library[$targetCardPlayer.library.length - 1];
    topCard._isRevealed = true;
    topCard.sprite(10, false);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

// Once per turn
$userCard.turnFlags.used = true;

// Pay 2 Levels
$userCard.gainLevel(-2);
$userCard.refresh();

// Set cards to draw

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'LIGHT') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

// Exhausts this card as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard);

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Draw 2 cards
var cards = 2;
var wait = true;
$targetCardPlayer.drawCard(cards, wait);

// Create list
$calc.list = $targetCardPlayer.hand;
$calc.pickWeakest = true;
$wait(10);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

enable = $userCardPlayer.library.length >= 2;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.level() >= 6) {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle Common Event: 984>

<Menu Category: Light>

<Card Pre-Battle JS>
// Check cards in hand.
if ($userCardPlayer.hand.length > 0) {
    // Gain Shields
    $userCardPlayer.shield += $userCardPlayer.hand.length;
    $userCardPlayer.shield = $userCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99);

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 53;
    var mirror = false;
    var delay = 0;
    $userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
}
</Card Pre-Battle JS>

<Card Spell 1 JS>
// Exhausts this card as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard);

// Calculate Heal
$calc.heal = $userCardPlayer.shield;

// Remove all shields
$userCardPlayer.shield = 0;

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Play Animation
var animationId = 56;
var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = $userCardPlayer.shield > 0;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

    // Gain Shields
    $userCardPlayer.shield += 10;
    $userCardPlayer.shield = $userCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99);

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 53;
    var mirror = false;
    var delay = 0;
    $userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
}
</Card Pre-Battle JS>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set Damage
$calc.damage = 5;

// If user player has 10 health or less
if ($userCardPlayer.health <= 10) {
    // Heal HP
    $userCardPlayer.health += 10;
    $userCardPlayer.health = Math.min($userCardPlayer.health, $userCardPlayer.maxHealth);

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 41;
    var mirror = false;
    var delay = 0;
    $userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Menu Category: Cards>
<Menu Category: Light>

<Card Hand Upkeep JS>
// Reveal card
$userCard._isRevealed = true;
$userCard.sprite().flip(10, false);

// Make sure have Health
if ($userCardPlayer.shield > 1) {
    // Pay 1 Health
    $userCardPlayer.shield -= 1;

    // Heal
    $userCardPlayer.health += 1;
    $userCardPlayer.health = Math.min($userCardPlayer.health, $userCardPlayer.maxHealth);

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 41;
    var mirror = false;
    var delay = 0;
    $userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
}
</Card Hand Upkeep JS>

note:
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage.
\fbSpell:\fb Self-Discard. Gain \i[84]Health equal to the \i[97]Power of the top card in your opponent's Discard. // Get top card of discard pile var topCard = $targetCardPlayer.discard[$targetCardPlayer.discard.length - 1]; // Set healing $calc.heal = topCard.power(); // Discards this card as a cost. $userCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($userCard); // Target card player is the user player. $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; enable = $targetCardPlayer.discard.length > 0;

<Card Spell 1 JS>
// Once per turn
$userCard.turnFlags.used = true;

// Pay 2 Levels
$userCard.gainLevel(-2);
$userCard.refresh();

// Set healing
$calc.heal = 1;

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = !$userCard.turnFlags.used
    && $userCard.level() >= 2;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'DARK') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle Common Event: 984>

note:
\fbEngage:\fb Pick a card in your Discard and exhaust it; This card's element matches that card during battle.
\fbVictory:\fb Deal 5 \i[76]Damage. // Create List $calc.list = $userCardPlayer.discard; // Set List Text $calc.listText = 'Select a card to Exhaust and Immitate.'; // Exhaust picked card $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($pickedCard); // Set user card to element card's $userCard.setElement($pickedCard.element()); $userCard.setTemplate($pickedCard._template); $userCard.sprite().setupCardFront(); $userCard.refresh(); // Play animation 51 var animationId = 51; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $userCard.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); // Restores card's original stats $userCard.restoreOriginalStats(); $userCard.sprite().setupCardFront();

<Card Spell 1 JS>

// Exhausts this card as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard);

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Mill 2 cards
$targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($targetCardPlayer.library.pop());
setTimeout($targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard.bind($targetCardPlayer, $targetCardPlayer.library.pop()), 1000/60 * 20);
$wait(40);

// Draw 2 Cards
$calc.drawCard = 2;
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = $userCardPlayer.library.length >= 4;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'DARK') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Pre-Battle JS>

$targetCard.gainLevel(-1 * $targetCard.power());

// Set Animation

var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$targetCard.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
$wait(40);
</Card Pre-Battle JS>

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Restores card's original stats
$targetCard.restoreOriginalStats();
</Card Post-Battle JS>

<Card Spell 1 JS>
// Exhausts this card as a cost.
$userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard);

// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Draw 2 cards
var cards = 2;
var wait = true;
$targetCardPlayer.drawCard(cards, wait);

// Create list
$calc.list = $targetCardPlayer.hand;
$calc.pickWeakest = true;
$wait(10);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = $userCardPlayer.library.length >= 2;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set Damage
$calc.damage = 5;

// If user player has 20 health or more
if ($userCardPlayer.health >= 20) {
    // Heal HP
    $userCardPlayer.health += 2;
    $userCardPlayer.health = Math.min($userCardPlayer.health, $userCardPlayer.maxHealth);

    // Play Animation
    var animationId = 41;
    var mirror = false;
    var delay = 0;
    $userCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
}
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Card Lose Battle JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Create an empty $calc.list
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.name().match(/Rogue/i)) {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

$calc.shuffleHand = true;
$calc.shuffleLibrary = true;
</Card Lose Battle JS>

<Card Spell 1 JS>
// Target card player is the user player.
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;

// Discards this card as a cost.
$targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard($userCard);

// Make an empty list to search through.
$calc.list = [];

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;

// Add all cards matching the criteria
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'DARK') {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

// Sort all cards.
$scene().sortCardGameCardSprites();
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
enable = false;

// Get ready to search through target's library
var searchList = $userCardPlayer.library;

// See if there's any cards that match the criteria.
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'DARK') {
        enable = true;
        break;
    }
}
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

</Card Pre-Battle JS>

<Card Pre-Battle Common Event: 981>

<Card Win Battle JS>
// Set damage
$calc.damage = Math.max(0, $userCard.level() - $targetCard.level());
</Card Win Battle JS>

<Card Win Battle Common Event: 991>

<Card Post-Battle JS>
// Restores card's original stats
$targetCard.gainLevel(1);
</Card Post-Battle JS>

\fb发动2:\fb从对方手卡选择1张卡移除 // Target card player is the user player. $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; // Exhausts this card as a cost. $targetCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); // Calculate the number of cards to draw. $calc.drawCard = Math.round(0.25 * ($userCardPlayer.currentHealth - 1)); // Deduct health from target player. $targetCardPlayer.currentHealth = 1; // Play an animation on the target player. var animationId = 54; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); enable = false; var cards = $userCardPlayer.hand.length; var library = $userCardPlayer.library.length; var health = $userCardPlayer.currentHealth; var chouqushu = Math.round(0.25 * ($userCardPlayer.currentHealth - 1)); enable = cards <= 100 && chouqushu <= library && health > 2 // Exhausts this card as a cost. $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); // Make an empty list to search through. $calc.list = []; // Reveal every card in player's hand for (var i = 0; i < $targetCardPlayer.hand.length; i++) { var card = $targetCardPlayer.hand[i]; $calc.list.push(card); } // Sort all cards. $scene().sortCardGameCardSprites(); enable = $targetCardPlayer.hand.length > 0; $calc.damage = $userCard.power();

<Card Spell 1 JS>
$userCard.turnFlags.used = true;
$calc.damage = 6;
$calc.shieldDamage = 0;
if ($targetCardPlayer.shield > 0) {
    var blocked = Math.min($targetCardPlayer.shield, $calc.damage);
    blocked = Math.max(blocked - $calc.shieldDamage, 0);
    $calc.shieldDamage += blocked;
    $calc.damage -= blocked;
}
$targetCardPlayer.shield -= $calc.shieldDamage || 0;
$targetCardPlayer.shield = $targetCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99);
$calc.shieldDamage = 0;
$targetCardPlayer.currentHealth -= $calc.damage;

var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);

for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.name().match(/暗黑/i)) {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}

\fb战后:\fb从卡组选择1张名字带有“暗黑” 的卡加入手卡 var shuliang = 0 for (var i = 0; i < $userCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) { var card = $userCardPlayer.discard[i]; // Check card element if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'DARK') { // Increase damage shuliang += 1; } } for (var i = 0; i < $targetCardPlayer.discard.length; i++) { var card = $targetCardPlayer.discard[i]; // Check card element if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'DARK') { // Increase damage shuliang += 1; } } $calc.damage = shuliang; $calc.shieldDamage = 0; if ($targetCardPlayer.shield > 0) { var blocked = Math.min($targetCardPlayer.shield, $calc.damage); blocked = Math.max(blocked - $calc.shieldDamage, 0); $calc.shieldDamage += blocked; $calc.damage -= blocked; } $targetCardPlayer.shield -= $calc.shieldDamage || 0; $targetCardPlayer.shield = $targetCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99); $calc.shieldDamage = 0; $targetCardPlayer.currentHealth -= $calc.damage; var animationId = $userCard.attackAnimationId(); var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); $targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer; $calc.list = []; var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library; for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) { var card = searchList[i]; if (card.name().match(/暗黑/i)) { $calc.list.push(card); } } $calc.shuffleHand = false; $calc.shuffleLibrary = false; $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); $calc.damage = $userCard.power();

<Card Spell 1 JS>
var shuliang = 0
var chouqu = [];
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
$targetCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard);
for (var i = 0; i < $userCardPlayer.library.length; i++) {
    var card = $targetCardPlayer.library[i];
    if (card.element().toUpperCase() === 'DARK') {
		chouqu.push(i)
		//card._isRevealed = true;
		card.sprite().flip(10, false);
		$spotlightCard = $pickedCard;
		//var bottom = false;
		$targetCardPlayer.addCardToHand(card);
		shuliang += 1;
		i--;
    } 
}
//alert(chouqu);
//alert(shuliang);
$targetCardPlayer.currentHealth -= shuliang;
var animationId = 54;
var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
$calc.drawCard = shuliang;
</Card Spell 1 JS>

    var card = $userCardPlayer.library[i];

    // Check card element

}

<Card Spell 1 JS>
$userCard.turnFlags.used = true;
$calc.damage = 6;
$calc.shieldDamage = 0;
if ($targetCardPlayer.shield > 0) {
    var blocked = Math.min($targetCardPlayer.shield, $calc.damage);
    blocked = Math.max(blocked - $calc.shieldDamage, 0);
    $calc.shieldDamage += blocked;
    $calc.damage -= blocked;
}
$targetCardPlayer.shield -= $calc.shieldDamage || 0;
$targetCardPlayer.shield = $targetCardPlayer.shield.clamp(0, 99);
$calc.shieldDamage = 0;
$targetCardPlayer.currentHealth -= $calc.damage;
var animationId = $userCard.attackAnimationId();
var mirror = false;
var delay = 0;
$targetCardPlayer.startAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay);
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
$calc.list = [];
var searchList = $targetCardPlayer.library;
for (var i = 0; i < searchList.length; i++) {
    var card = searchList[i];
    if (card.name().match(/暗黑/i)) {
        $calc.list.push(card);
    }
}
</Card Spell 1 JS>

\fb战后:\fb移除此卡 var dengji = $targetCard.level(); var gongji = $targetCard.power(); var animationId = 54; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $targetCard.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); $wait(40); $targetCard.setLevel(0); $targetCard.setPower(0); $targetCard.refresh(); var animationId = 51; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $userCard.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); $wait(40); var shanghai = dengji + gongji; $userCard.setPower(shanghai); $userCard.refresh(); var animationId = 54; var mirror = false; var delay = 0; $userCardPlayer.playAnimation(animationId, mirror, delay); $wait(40); $userCardPlayer.currentHealth -= shanghai; $userCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust($userCard); $calc.damage = $userCard.power();

<Card Art: E3, 归来的异乡骑士>

<Card Element: None>

<Card Power: 2>
<Card Health: 5>

</Card Parallax BG: Earth>
</Card Parallax BG Speed: +1, +0>
</Card Parallax BG Opacity: 255>
</Card Parallax BG Blend Mode: Screen>

<Card Text>
<WordWrap>\fb场地:\fb准备阶段，若此卡处于场地区，
对对方造成3点伤害
</Card Text>

<Menu Category: 全部卡牌>
<Menu Category: 法术牌>

<Card Spell 1 JS>
$gameVariables.setValue(20, 1);
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
$calc.damage = $userCard.currentHealth();
$userCardPlayer.summon($userCard);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Icon: 188>
<Card Spell 1 Name: 召唤>
<Card Spell 1 Allow AI Use>
<Card Spell 1 Animation: 51>
<Card Spell 1 Common Event: 993>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
var summon = $gameVariables.value(20);
enable = false;
enable = $userCardPlayer.pileA.length < 3
         && summon < 1;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Win Battle JS>
var oppsum = $targetCardPlayer.pileA.length;
if(oppsum > 0){
    var card = $targetCardPlayer.pileA[0];
    $targetCardPlayer.removeCardFromAllPiles(card);
    $targetCardPlayer.addCardToExhaust(card);
    $calc.damage = 0;
}else{
    $calc.damage = $userCard.power();
}   
</Card Win Battle JS>
<Card Win Battle Common Event: 991>

<Card Text>
<WordWrap>\fb场地:\fb准备阶段，若此卡处于场地区，
对对方造成3点伤害
</Card Text>

<Menu Category: 全部卡牌>
<Menu Category: 法术牌>

<Card Spell 1 JS>
$gameVariables.setValue(20, 1);
$targetCardPlayer = $userCardPlayer;
$calc.damage = $userCard.currentHealth();
$userCardPlayer.summon($userCard);
</Card Spell 1 JS>

<Card Spell 1 Icon: 188>
<Card Spell 1 Name: 召唤>
<Card Spell 1 Allow AI Use>
<Card Spell 1 Animation: 51>
<Card Spell 1 Common Event: 993>

<Card Spell 1 Enable>
var summon = $gameVariables.value(20);
enable = false;
enable = $userCardPlayer.pileA.length < 3
         && summon < 1;
</Card Spell 1 Enable>

<Card Win Battle JS>
var oppsum = $targetCardPlayer.pileA.length;
if(oppsum > 0){
    var card = $targetCardPlayer.pileA[0];
    $targetCardPlayer.addCardToDiscard(card);
    var discount = $targetCardPlayer.discard.length;
    discount -= 1;
    var dis = $targetCardPlayer.discard[discount];
    $targetCardPlayer.removeCardFromCustomPile(dis, 'A')
    $calc.damage = 0;
}else{
    $calc.damage = $userCard.power();
}   
</Card Win Battle JS>
<Card Win Battle Common Event: 991>
